name: Outcore
storyline: A girl named Lumi appears on your desktop. Lost and without memories, Lumi has no way to get home. Help Lumi uncover her past by working together. Find lost memory files, fight bosses, interact with your computer, and discover the secrets of Lumi's past.
summary: A girl named Lumi appears on your desktop. Lost and without memories, Lumi has no way to get home. Help Lumi uncover her past by working together. Find lost memory files, fight bosses, interact with your computer, and discover the secrets of Lumi's past.
